Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: a stream running through the dark grassland

A clear stream cuts southward through the grassland, the trees following the western bank before spreading out across the northern horizon in the distance. The fresh green grasses of spring sway supple with the breeze along the waters flowing fast with the thaw. Birdsong carries over the undulating waves of the field under the warmth of the sun. Moonglow and starlight infuse the area with dim light, long shadows pooling at the base of the forest in the distance. The long stalks of green grass sway in slow swirling patterns along the banks of the lazily babbling creek. The heat of the summer sun warms the area, filling the air with the aromatic scents of the warm field. Starlit skies are the only source of light, the still warm field bathed in the cloak of night. Golden stalks of grass rustle with the breeze, the sound complimented by the slowly babbling cadence of the creek. Rose gold sunshine floods the area, complimented by the painter's palette of autumnal leaves in the nearby forest. Silvery moonlight dances over the waters as leaves float relaxedly on into the dark of night. The grasses have been matted down by frost and bits of ice cling to the banks of the creek in the deep-set chill of winter. The sun angles low in the sky but does little to warm the surrounding area. Starlight reflects off of small patches of frost and ice, the light doing little to ward off the darkness of night.

the down-sloping bank of a stream
The down-sloping bank of a clear stream.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{ A constant trickling of water can be heard. \| \The sun casts a warm light on the clear stream.\\The light of night casts a reflective glow on the clear stream.\ \| Something falls into the stream with a gentle plop. \| A cluster of leaves float down the stream. \| Somewhere out of sight, a toad croaks. \| \The night air is filled with the sound of crickets.\ \A \{fat\|plump\|short\|stubby\|long\|scrawny\|small\} fish swims downstream.\ \}

X[S] \{ A constant trickling of water can be heard. \| \The sun casts a warm light on the clear stream.\\The light of night casts a reflective glow on the clear stream.\ \| Something falls into the stream with a gentle plop. \| A cluster of leaves float down the stream. \| Somewhere out of sight, a toad croaks. \| \The night air is filled with the sound of crickets.\ \A \{fat\|plump\|short\|stubby\|long\|scrawny\|small\} fish swims downstream.\ \}
